dataList.content: Right, then. Was that the last of the Bloodfiends here?
Mhm! 'Twas a victory in our favor!
No. There's more.
Trembling rats inside that coffin. They lack even a morsel of shame.
We opened the coffin Ryōshū singled out...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Gah! Holy shit!
... and several Bloodfiends came tumbling out.
L-look who's talking...
<... Ryōshū, can you see through walls, by any chance?>
I only smelled their dirty cowardice.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: ... Did... did they leave?
Who do you mean by 'they'?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: The monsters who came to hunt us... those... bastards going around smashing our rides and attractions...
Ohh~ I think I know who you're talking about. Did they make it safely past this attraction?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Probably...?
You didn't get a good look at them?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: We had no choice. Our roles were to jump out and scare people during the 'The Banquet with Bloodfiends' scene, but... we stayed put in here because they were even scarier...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Th-the visitors used to scream and run when we'd jump out of these coffins... They really, really loved it... We even took pictures with them once they were done with the attraction...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Hey, guys... wanna know something cool? We're running an event where we'll take a free commemorative picture with you for only 400ml of blood. How's that, how's that? Don't ya wanna leave a picture of this spoooooky experience?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: 400ml is nothing, right? It's just a little trickle of blood with no danger to your health. I even heard that you humans have to draw blood once in a while anyway to renew your blood supply and keep things fresh and healthy. You all wanna live long, healthy lives, don't you? I betcha do!
Mate, you serious...?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Heeugh! No, no. I'm sorry. I won't drink your blood. Not even a drop. I... I didn't want to be a part of that plan anyway... I just wanted to get out of here.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: ... That reminds me. I wonder what happened to the one who managed to escape? I should've run away too, when I had the chance...
It is likely that he is referring to Cassetti.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: But... would outside be any better? How will I live on? Hiding in sewers like rats... hiding from humans...?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: I don't want that life... no, but this place is also just... so... ahh...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: We're cornered... there's nothing we can do! We have no options left! It's either die or live a life worse than dying...!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: This accursed La Manchaland!
